titleStmt.title: A proclamation for coynes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Dated on page [2]: VVestminster, the sixteenth day of Nouember, in the second yeere of our reigne ... .
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
